product_name: PATC Map F - Trails in Great North Mountain - North Half of George Washington National Forest
long_description: Covers the George Washington National Forest along the VA-WV state line from Capon Springs and Wardensville to Bryce Ski Resort and Orkney Springs.
short_description: Covers the George Washington National Forest along the VA-WV state line from Capon Springs and Wardensville to Bryce Ski Resort and Orkney Springs.
